EmailTemplate.name: Water Webinar - 020915
EmailTemplate.subject: AECOM Webinar: Advanced water purification - where are we heading?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WEBINAR: ADVANCED WATER PURIFICATION WHERE ARE WE HEADING?
This webinar will summarise the issues surrounding the implementation of an advanced water purification facility for groundwater recharge, surface water augmentation and direct potable reuse. A historical perspective drawn from half a dozen projects will be provided to review the challenges faced in the past, present, and future. Special emphasis will be placed on current challenges, trends and innovative low cost solutions.
Webinar details
On: 2 September 2015 Speaker: Greg Bradshaw, AECOM
All webinars are broadcast three times a day to enable global attendance:
15:00 GMT (10:00 ET) 20:00 GMT (15:00 ET) 3:00 GMT (22:00 ET)
Pre-register here for this free webinar. http://www.aecom.com/vgn-ext-templating/v/index.jsp?vgnextoid=20195767eff4f410VgnVCM100000089e1bacRCRD&vgnextchannel=969d1db9e0a60210VgnVCM1000004c6311acRCRD&vgnextfmt=default&utm_campaign=sector-water&utm_medium=email&utm_source=employee-email&utm_content=short-link&utm_term=webinar5
Free and open to all, AECOM’s client webinars provide 60 minutes of discussion on issues important in today’s water industry.
